RelatedSentence: In 2008 , one year after Stephenson became its CEO , AT&T was unable to outbid Verizon at highly anticipated government spectrum auctions .
That same year , when rival Alltel and its valuable spectrum went on the block - spectrum that was a perfect fit for AT&T - Stephenson was again outbid by Verizon .

A0: the telco giant 's CEO Randall Stephenson
RelatedSentence: The missed deals , in part , led to AT&T , the No. 1 wireless company in 2007 when Stephenson took over as CEO , falling far behind Verizon .
31 , Verizon had 96 million post-paid wireless customers , compared with AT&T 's 73 million .
Perhaps more important , AT&T in 2007 had double Verizon 's free cash flow ( net cash from operations minus capital expenditures ) .
Now , the rivals have reversed positions .
Verizon in 2013 generated $ 22 billion in free cash flow , compared to AT&T 's $ 14 billion .
Stephenson said in 2007 that video represented a once-in-a-decade opportunity to build AT&T 's next billion - dollar business .
